location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 15 August and reiterating the order to conclude a treaty with the Joasimese [Qasimi] Chief.
